attributes.action: not allow tax credits for migrants children that do not reside in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: appauled to find out that migrant workers can claim for children under the  working tax credit that do not live with them in the uk.What a financial strain on our country when it fails the britsh citizen in so many ways

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "not allow tax credits for migrants children that do not reside in the uk."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16586

Prime Minister's Office
